textBeforeTable: Please use the chart below to convert between standard size formats Size Conversion Chart Browse & buy Helene Berman clothing & accessories online at Jules B... The Helene Berman brand is synonymous with high quality, alongside innovative and stylish tailoring. The label also provides a stunning collection of luxury women's hats for everyday wear and occasions. Luxury fabrics are mixed with contemporary trims to create hats that offer the wearer a touch of elegance. Helene Berman, the award winning British designer, provides a stunning collection of luxury women's clothing and accessories. Premium fabrics sourced from all round the world are mixed with quirky trims to create simple, well-made and elegant clothing that is unique, introducing a touch of sophistication to any ensemble.
